metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13627 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was discovered that there was a ECDSA timing attack in the libgcrypt20 cryptographic library. Version affected: 1.8.4-5, 1.7.6-2+deb9u3, and 1.6.3-2+deb8u4. Versions fixed: 1.8.5-2 and 1.6.3-2+deb8u7.

notes.Note: leosilva> patch breaks dsa-rfc6979.c tests in Xenial.

criterions.comment: libgcrypt11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libgcrypt20: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
